notification.message: This is a very long notification message designed to test how the user interface handles text that should ideally wrap or be truncated gracefully instead of overflowing its container.

profile.bio: This is the biography of the administrator. It contains a rather long sentence that describes their roles and responsibilities within the system, which is another great test for text overflow and wrapping within the confines of the TUI panels.
